mapper.select: select sys_user.ID sysUserId, sys_user.REAL_NAME realName, sys_user.WORKID workId, b_department.`NAME` departmentName from sys_user, b_department where sys_user.Valid = 1 and b_department.Valid = 1 and sys_user.WORKID = #{workId} and sys_user.PASSWORD = #{password} and sys_user.DEPARTMENT_ID = b_department.ID

SELECT admin_info.sysUserId, admin_info.realName, admin_info.workId, b_department.`NAME` departmentName FROM b_department, (SELECT sys_user.ID sysUserId, sys_user.REAL_NAME realName, sys_user.WORKID workId, sys_user.DEPARTMENT_ID FROM sb_user_role LEFT JOIN sys_user ON sb_user_role.USER_ID = sys_user.ID LEFT JOIN sys_role ON sb_user_role.ROLE_ID = sys_role.ID WHERE sb_user_role.Valid = 1 AND sys_user.Valid = 1 AND sys_role.Valid = 1 AND sys_role.SR_MANAGE = 1 AND sys_user.WORKID = #{workId} AND sys_user.`PASSWORD` = #{password}) admin_info WHERE b_department.Valid = 1 AND b_department.ID = admin_info.DEPARTMENT_ID LIMIT 1

SELECT sys_user.ID id, b_department.`NAME` departmentName, sys_user.WORKID workId, sys_user.REAL_NAME realName, sys_user.ID_CODE idCode, sys_user.PHONE phone, sys_user.EMAIL email FROM sys_user, b_department WHERE sys_user.Valid = 1 AND b_department.Valid = 1 AND sys_user.DEPARTMENT_ID = b_department.ID

SELECT sys_user.ID id, b_department.`NAME` departmentName, sys_user.WORKID workId, sys_user.REAL_NAME realName, sys_user.ID_CODE idCode, sys_user.PHONE phone, sys_user.EMAIL email FROM sys_user, b_department WHERE sys_user.Valid = 1 AND b_department.Valid = 1 AND sys_user.DEPARTMENT_ID = b_department.ID LIMIT #{param1}, #{param2}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(department_id, workid, real_name, password, salt, id_code, phone, email, account_date, created_by, updated_by, valid) values(#{department.id}, #{wordId}, #{realName}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{idCard}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{accountDate}, #{createBy}, #{updated_by}, 1)
